comments.body: Side note: It is starting to become attractive to overload `createCmd` and friends so we donâ€™t get collisions between daml triggers and daml script. I expect in almost all cases type inference will work fine here but needs someone to actually try it out.
I would expect the same, particularly when you use a helper function like the newly introduces `script`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@  bob <- Script.allocateParty "Bob"

  coinProposal <- submit alice $ Script.createCmd (CoinProposal alice bob)
  coin <- submit bob $ Script.exerciseCmd coinProposal CoinProposal_Accept
